## BenchmarkOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BenchmarkOpts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [iter](./bench.benchmarkopts.iter.md) | <code>number</code> | Number of iterations |
|  [print](./bench.benchmarkopts.print.md) | <code>boolean</code> | If true, writes progress &amp; results to console. |
|  [title](./bench.benchmarkopts.title.md) | <code>string</code> | Benchmark title (only used if <code>print</code> enabled) |
|  [warmup](./bench.benchmarkopts.warmup.md) | <code>number</code> | Number of warmup iterations (not included in results). |
